mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writer, to_char(start1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"') start1, to_char(end1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"') end1, content, backgroundcolor, textcolor, allday, url FROM calendar
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar values( cal_seq.nextval, #{title}, to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"'), to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"'), #{writer}, #{content}, #{backgroundColor}, #{textColor}, #{allDay}, #{url} )
